backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing the e-commerce backend with user profiles, product CRUD (admin-only), shopping cart, and order management, using role-based access control via MixinAuthorization and AccessControl modules.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two admin-panel features (admin page at /admin with product management and admin nav link in header) to their implementing files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries for each frontend source file, covering pages, components, hooks, styles, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes including background, foreground, primary, border, chart, and sidebar color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the Vite/React app titled 'Solano7m' that mounts the React root and loads the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with all application routes (home, catalog, product detail, cart, checkout, order success, orders, admin), wraps the app in ThemeProvider, and renders the Toaster and profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Full-page layout component providing a sticky header with logo, navigation links (including a conditional Admin link for admin users), cart badge, auth button, mobile menu, and a branded footer.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Reusable product card component displaying image, category badge, name, description, price, stock status, and an Add to Cart button with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog that prompts new users to enter their name during initial profile setup, submitting via the `useSaveCallerUserProfile` mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React Query hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an `InternetIdentityProvider` context and `useInternetIdentity` hook that manage ICP AuthClient lifecycle, login/logout, and identity state persistence across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for the app, covering user profile, admin check, products, cart, and orders CRUD operations against the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Google Fonts, configures Tailwind CSS, and defines a warm earthy OKLCH color palette for both light and dark themes via CSS custom properties.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with `QueryClientProvider` and `InternetIdentityProvider`.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page that allows authenticated admin users to create, edit, and delete products via a table UI with dialog forms and confirmation alerts.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart page with item rows showing product images, quantity controls, and line totals, using cart mutation hooks to update or remove items.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Displays a product catalog with a hero banner, search input, and category filter badges, rendering filtered product cards or skeletons while loading.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Shows an order summary of cart items with a grand total and a place-order button, redirecting to the success page on completion or prompting sign-in if unauthenticated.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page featuring a hero section, a three-feature highlights grid (curated selection, secure shopping, fast delivery), and a call-to-action banner linking to the catalog.
frontend/src/pages/OrderHistoryPage.tsx: Lists the authenticated user's past orders as cards with status badges, item details, timestamps, and totals, fetched via order and product query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/OrderSuccessPage.tsx: Static confirmation page displayed after a successful order, showing the order ID and navigation buttons to view orders or continue shopping.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: React page component that displays full product details (image, price, stock, description) fetched by ID, with quantity selection and an Add to Cart button that requires authentication.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module providing helper functions to read, persist, and clear URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, using sessionStorage for cross-navigation persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom fonts (Playfair Display, Inter), an oklch-based color palette (terracotta, cream, charcoal, sidebar, chart), and plugin integrations for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state snapshot for the Solano7m e-commerce app, tracking schema version, implemented features (catalog, product detail, cart, checkout, order history, admin panel, theming), and associated requirement IDs.
